00325 #if !HAVE_USE_NETLINK
00326 #define ba_id2path(path, id)  snprintf((path), 100, "/tmp/blackadder.%05u", (id))       
00327 #if defined(__FreeBSD__) || defined(__OpenBSD__)
00328 
00329 inline int
00330 ba_path2id(const char *path) {
00331     const char *errstr = NULL;
00332     int num = (int) strtonum((path) + 16, 0, 99999/*PID_MAX*/, &errstr);
00333     return (errstr == NULL) ? num : -1;
00334 }
00335 #else
00336 #define ba_path2id(path) atoi((path) + 16)
00337 #endif
00338 #endif
00339 #endif
